name: Pocket Sized Platformer
description:
Made for the Mini Jam 10 -Micro- 

For some reason you like eating bugs.

Radioactive bugs

That make you become smaller

Tip: You change every 3 ;)

I actually only found this game jam today at noon. Which left me about 10 hours (even though less due to meals and such) to make this little game.

If any errors or criticism please leave a comment below. Thanks :)
